title: GLADIATOR GAMES - Colosseum Mod Gameplay - Total War: Attila
description:
Are you not entertained? Well you are about to be!  We are about to watch a Bloody tournament between 8 Gladiators.  Enjoy the epic duels.  This is a Mod to total war Attila Enjoy :D

Mod: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516298729

Vote Here: http://strawpoll.me/7423254

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
